mapper.select: select city as "CITY" from code_city_name order by 1
select gun as "GUN" from code_gun_name where city = #{city} order by 1
select gu as "GU" from code_gu_name where gun = #{gun} order by 1
select path as "PATH" , label as "LABEL" , before_path as "BEFORE_PATH" from breadcrumbs where path = #{path} and user_flag = #{user_flag}
